# onTintColor

**Instance Property**

The color used to tint the appearance of the switch when it’s in the on position.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var onTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Customizing the appearance of the switch

- **thumbTintColor**: The color used to tint the appearance of the thumb.
